verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> don't <S%H3198><s%> rebuke me in your wrath, <S%H7110><s%> neither chasten <S%H3256><s%> me in your hot displeasure. <S%H2534><s%>
For your arrows <S%H2671><s%> have pierced <S%H5181><s%> me, <S%H3027><s%> your hand presses hard on me. <S%H5181><s%>

There is no soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh <S%H1320><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of your indignation, <S%H2195><s%> neither is there any health <S%H7965><s%> in my bones <S%H6106><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of my sin. <S%H2403><s%>
For my iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have gone over <S%H5674><s%> my head. <S%H7218><s%> As a heavy <S%H3515><s%> burden, <S%H4853><s%> they are too heavy for me. <S%H3515><s%>
My wounds <S%H2250><s%> are loathsome <S%H887><s%> and corrupt, <S%H4743><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of my foolishness. <S%H200><s%>
I am pained <S%H5753><s%> and bowed down <S%H7817><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%> I go <S%H1980><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%> all day long. <S%H3117><s%>
For my waist <S%H3689><s%> is filled <S%H4390><s%> with burning. <S%H7033><s%> There is no soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh. <S%H1320><s%>
I am faint <S%H6313><s%> and severely <S%H3966><s%> bruised. <S%H1794><s%> I have groaned <S%H7580><s%> by reason of the anguish <S%H5100><s%> of my heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> all my desire <S%H8378><s%> is before you. <S%H585><s%> My groaning is not hidden from you. <S%H5641><s%>
My heart <S%H3820><s%> throbs. <S%H5503><s%> My strength <S%H3581><s%> fails <S%H5800><s%> me. <S%H216><s%> As for the light of my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> it <S%H1992><s%> has also left me. <S%H369><s%>
My lovers <S%H157><s%> and my friends <S%H7453><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> aloof from <S%H5048><s%> my plague. <S%H5061><s%> My kinsmen <S%H7138><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> far away. <S%H7350><s%>

They also who seek <S%H1245><s%> after my life <S%H5315><s%> lay snares. <S%H5367><s%> Those who seek <S%H1875><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> mischievous things, <S%H1942><s%> and meditate <S%H1897><s%> deceits <S%H4820><s%> all day long. <S%H3117><s%>
But I, <S%H2795><s%> as a deaf man, <S%H8085><s%> don't hear. I am as a mute man <S%H483><s%> who doesn't <S%H6605><s%> open his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Yes, <S%H376><s%> I am as a man who doesn't <S%H8085><s%> hear, in whose mouth <S%H6310><s%> are no reproofs. <S%H8433><s%>
For in you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, do I hope. <S%H3176><s%> You will answer, <S%H6030><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> my God. <S%H430><s%>
For I said, <S%H559><s%> "Don't <S%H8055><s%> let them gloat over me, <S%H1431><s%> or exalt themselves over me when my foot <S%H7272><s%> slips. <S%H4131><s%>"
For I am ready <S%H3559><s%> to fall. <S%H6761><s%> My pain <S%H4341><s%> is continually before me. <S%H8548><s%>
For I will declare <S%H5046><s%> my iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> I will be sorry <S%H1672><s%> for my sin. <S%H2403><s%>
But my enemies <S%H341><s%> are vigorous <S%H2416><s%> and many. <S%H6105><s%> Those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me without reason <S%H8267><s%> are numerous. <S%H7231><s%>
They who also render <S%H7999><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%> are adversaries <S%H7853><s%> to me, <S%H7291><s%> because I follow what is good. <S%H2896><s%>
Don't <S%H5800><s%> forsake me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. My God, <S%H430><s%> don't <S%H7368><s%> be far from me.
Hurry <S%H2363><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me, <S%H136><s%> Lord, my salvation. <S%H8668><s%>
